content:
ChangeRequest:
  RemoveFeature: 
    - Counter
  AddFeature: 
    - OnboardingFlow:
        AppName: Gyde
        Pages:
          - WelcomePage:
              Text: 'Get Started', 'Experience luxury travel with ease. Register and manage your bookings seamlessly.'
              Button: 'Next'
          - AuthenticationOptionsPage:
              Text: 'Continue with Phone', 'Continue with Email'
              Button: 'Next'
          - PhoneNumberInputPage:
              Text: 'Add Your Phone', 'Enter your phone number to get yourself verified and ready to start your ride.', 'Phone Number'
              Button: 'Next'
          - VerificationCodePage:
              Text: 'Enter Code', 'We sent verification code to your phone number +65 8123 4567'
              Button: 'Next'
          - EmailCollectionPage:
              Text: 'Stay Connected', 'To provide you with tailored services and updates, please share your email with us.', 'Email Address'
              Button: 'Next'
          - WelcomeConfirmationPage:
              Text: 'Welcome Aboard!', 'You've unlocked access to exclusive, personalized chauffeur services with Gyde.', 'Experience comfort, Tailored to your needs'
              Button: 'Next'
          - TermsAndConditionsPage:
              Text: 'By continuing, you have read and agree to our terms and condition.', 'Please read these terms of use carefully before using this platform', 'Welcome to Gyde! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.'
              Button: 'Continue'
        Branding: Gyde

overview: 
  - The application will undergo significant changes to replace the existing counter feature with a new onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. This involves adding multiple onboarding pages with sliding transitions and removing the counter functionality.
new_features: 
  - Welcome Page with 'Get Started' and introductory text
  - Authentication Options Page with 'Continue with Phone' and 'Continue with Email'
  - Phone Number Input Page with phone number entry and verification prompt
  - Verification Code Page with code entry instructions
  - Email Collection Page for collecting user emails
  - Welcome Confirmation Page with confirmation messages
  - Terms and Conditions Page with agreement text
modified_features: 
  - Navigation flow to include onboarding pages
  - AppView to initialize the onboarding flow
removed_features: 
  - Counter functionality from HomeView and HomeViewModel
architectural_changes: 
  - The app.router.dart file will be updated to include routes for the new onboarding pages. Dependency injection setup in app.locator.dart may need adjustments to accommodate new services related to onboarding.
cross_cutting_concerns: 
  - Ensure consistent branding with 'Gyde' across all new onboarding pages
  - Implement sliding transitions for smooth navigation between onboarding pages
  - Update state management to handle the onboarding flow and user authentication state
